keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Sanbyaku Pound Cannon Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses his Devil Fruit powers in combination with Zoro's Hyakuhachi Pound Ho to create the Gomu Gomu no Sanbyaku Pound Cannon, a powerful combination attack that breaks through the Aqua Laguna.

abilitiesRevealed.name: Gomu Gomu no Sanbyaku Pound Cannon
abilitiesRevealed.description: A combination attack with Zoro where Luffy and Zoro simultaneously fire their attacks (Gomu Gomu no Cannon and Hyakuhachi Pound Ho) to create a devastating combined force capable of breaking through massive obstacles.

significance: This episode showcases a new application of Luffy's Devil Fruit powers - the ability to synchronize with teammates for combination attacks, expanding the tactical possibilities of his abilities.
